ComicInfo.Summary:
ALL MY CODEXES LIVE IN TEXAS*
*By "Texas" we mean "Deadpool's spine." Sorry, we just couldn't NOT do that pun.
With his potent combination of codexes from different symbiotes, the fate of the fight between good and evil lies within Deadpool!
He's...on the side of good, right? Honestly, sometimes it's hard to tell. I mean, Spider-Man likes him, right? Kind of? That's...something.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------------|---------------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Tyler Kirkham & Arif Prianto | 1 | | Var | Codex Variant Cover | Mark Bagley, Andrew Hennessey & Jason Keith | 2 | | Var | Connecting Variant Cover | Rob Liefeld & Romulo Fajardo Jr. | 3 |
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrew Hennessy,Arif Prianto,Jason Keith,Mark Bagley,Rob Liefeld,Romulo Fajardo Jr.,Tyler Kirkham
